h7601.definition: a primitive root; to plunder; spoil.

h7602.definition: a primitive root; to inhale eagerly; figuratively, to cover; by implication, to be angry; also to hasten; desire (earnestly), devour, haste, pant, snuff up, swallow up.

h7603.definition: from {{h7604}}; barm or yeast-cake (as swelling by fermentation); leaven.

h7604.definition: a primitive root; properly, to swell up, i.e. be (causatively, make) redundant; leave, (be) left, let, remain, remnant, reserve, the rest.

h7605.definition: from {{h7604}}; a remainder; × other, remnant, residue, rest.

h7606.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7605}}; × whatsoever more, residue, rest.

h7607.definition: from {{h7604}}; flesh (as swelling out), as living or for food; generally food of any kind; figuratively, kindred by blood; body, flesh, food, (near) kin(-sman, -swoman), near (nigh) (of kin).

h7608.definition: feminine of {{h7607}}; female kindred by blood; near kinswomen.

h7609.definition: the same as {{h7608}}; Sheerah, an Israelitess; Sherah.

h7610.definition: from {{h7605}} and {{h7725}}; a remnant will return; Shear-Jashub, the symbolic name of one of Isaiah's sons; Shear-jashub.

h7611.definition: from {{h7604}}; a remainder or residual (surviving, final) portion; that had escaped, be left, posterity, remain(-der), remnant, residue, rest.

h7613.definition: from {{h5375}}; an elevation or leprous scab; figuratively, elation or cheerfulness; exaltation in rank or character; be accepted, dignity, excellency, highness, raise up self, rising.

h7614.definition: of foreign origin; Sheba, the name of three early progenitors of tribes and of an Ethiopian district; Sheba, Sabeans.

h7615.definition: patronymic from {{h7614}}; a Shebaite or descendant of Sheba; Sabean.

h7616.definition: from an unused root meaning to break up; a fragment, i.e. ruin; broken in pieces.

h7617.definition: a primitive root; to transport into captivity; (bring away, carry, carry away, lead, lead away, take) captive(-s), drive (take) away.

h7618.definition: from an unused root (probably identical with that of {{h7617}} through the idea of subdivision into flashes or streamers (compare {{h7632}}) meaning to flame; a gem (from its sparkle), probably the agate; agate.

h7619.definition: or שׁוּבָאֵל; from {{h7617}} (abbreviated form) or {{h7725}} and {{h410}}; captive (or returned) of God; Shebuel or Shubael, the name of two Israelites; Shebuel, Shubael.

h7620.definition: or שָׁבֻעַ; also (feminine) שְׁבֻעָה; properly, passive participle of {{h7650}} as a denominative of {{h7651}}; literally, sevened, i.e. a week (specifically, of years); seven, week.

h7621.definition: feminine passive participle of {{h7650}}; properly, something sworn, i.e. an oath; curse, oath, × sworn.

h7622.definition: or שְׁבִית; from {{h7617}}; exile, concretely, prisoners; figuratively, a former state of prosperity; captive(-ity).

h7623.definition: a primitive root; properly, to address in a loud tone, i.e. (specifically) loud; figuratively, to pacify (as if by words); commend, glory, keep in, praise, still, triumph.

h7624.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7623}}; to adulate, i.e. adore; praise.

h7626.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to branch off; a scion, i.e. (literally) a stick (for punishing, writing, fighting, ruling, walking, etc.) or (figuratively) a clan; × correction, dart, rod, sceptre, staff, tribe.

h7627.definition: of foreign origin; Shebat, a Jewish month; Sebat.

h7628.definition: from {{h7618}}; exiled; captured; as noun, exile (abstractly or concretely and collectively); by extension, booty; captive(-ity), prisoners, × take away, that was taken.

h7629.definition: from {{h7617}}; captor; Shobi, an Ammonite; Shobi.

h7632.definition: from the same as {{h7616}}; flame (as split into tongues); spark.

h7633.definition: feminine of {{h7628}}; exile (abstractly or concretely and collectively); captives(-ity).

h7634.definition: feminine of the same as {{h7629}}; captivation; Shobjah, an Israelite; Shachia (from the margin).

h7635.definition: from the same as {{h7640}}; a track or passage-way (as if flowing along); path.

h7636.definition: from an unused root meaning to interweave; a netting for the hair; caul.

h7637.definition: or שְׁבִעִי; ordinal from {{h7657}}; seventh; seventh (time).

h7638.definition: from an unused root meaning to intwine; a netting (ornament to the capital of a column); net.

h7639.definition: feminine of {{h7638}}; a net-work, i.e. (in hunting) a snare, (in architecture) a ballustrade; also a reticulated ornament to a pillar; checker, lattice, network, snare, wreath(-enwork).

h7640.definition: from an unused root meaning to flow; a lady's train (as trailing after her); leg.

h7641.definition: or (feminine) שִׁבֹּלֶת; from the same as {{h7640}}; a stream (as flowing); also an ear of grain (as growing out); by analogy, a branch; branch, channel, ear (of corn), (water-)flood, Shibboleth. Compare {{h5451}}.

h7642.definition: from the same as {{h7640}}; a snail (as if floating in its own slime); snail.

h7643.definition: or (feminine) שִׂבְמָה; probably from {{h1313}}; spice; Sebam or Sibmah, a place in Moab; Shebam, Shibmah, Sibmah.

h7644.definition: or שֶׁבְנָה; from an unused root meaning to grow; growth; Shebna or Shebnah, an Israelite; Shebna, Shebnah.

h7645.definition: or שְׁבַנְיָהוּ; from the same as {{h7644}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has grown (i.e. prospered); Shebanjah, the name of three or four Israelites; Shebaniah.

h7646.definition: or שָׂבֵעַ; a primitive root; to sate, i.e. fill to satisfaction (literally or figuratively); have enough, fill (full, self, with), be (to the) full (of), have plenty of, be satiate, satisfy (with), suffice, be weary of.

h7648.definition: from {{h7646}}; satisfaction (of food or [figuratively] joy); fill, full(-ness), satisfying, be satisfied.

h7649.definition: from {{h7646}}; satiated (in a pleasant or disagreeable sense); full (of), satisfied (with).

h7650.definition: a primitive root; properly to be complete, but used only as a denominative from {{h7651}}; to seven oneself, i.e. swear (as if by repeating a declaration seven times); adjure, charge (by an oath, with an oath), feed to the full (by mistake for {{h7646}}), take an oath, × straitly, (cause to, make to) swear.

h7651.definition: or (masculine) (שִׁבְעָה); from {{h7650}}; a primitive cardinal number; seven (as the sacred full one); also (adverbially) seven times; by implication, a week; by extension, an indefinite number; (  by) seven(-fold),-s, (-teen, -teenth), -th, times). Compare {{h7658}}.

h7652.definition: the same as {{h7651}}; seven; Sheba, the name of a place in Palestine, and of two Israelites; Sheba.

h7654.definition: feminine of {{h7648}}; satiety; (to have) enough, × till...be full, (un-) satiable, satisfy, × sufficiently.

h7656.definition: masculine of {{h7651}}; seven(-th); Shebah, a well in Palestine; Shebah.

h7657.definition: multiple of {{h7651}}; seventy; seventy, threescore and ten (  -teen).

h7658.definition: prolonged for the masculine of {{h7651}}; seven; seven.

h7660.definition: a primitive root; to interweave (colored) threads in squares; by implication (of reticulation) to inchase gems in gold; embroider, set.

h7662.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to the root of {{h7733}}; to quit, i.e. allow to remain; leave, let alone.

h7663.definition: erroneously שָׁבַר; (Nehemiah 2:13,15), a primitive root; to scrutinize; by implication (of watching) to expect (with hope and patience); hope, tarry, view, wait.

h7665.definition: a primitive root; to burst (literally or figuratively); break (down, off, in pieces, up), broken (-hearted), bring to the birth, crush, destroy, hurt, quench, × quite, tear, view (by mistake for {{h7663}}).

h7666.definition: denominative from {{h7668}}; to deal in grain; buy, sell.

h7667.definition: or שֵׁבֶר; from {{h7665}}; a fracture, figuratively, ruin; specifically, a solution (of a dream); affliction, breach, breaking, broken(-footed, -handed), bruise, crashing, destruction, hurt, interpretation, vexation.

h7668.definition: the same as {{h7667}}; grain (as if broken into kernels); corn, victuals.

h7669.definition: the same as {{h7667}}; Sheber, an Israelite; Sheber.

h7670.definition: from {{h7665}}; rupture, i.e. a pang; figuratively, ruin; breaking, destruction.

h7671.definition: plural of {{h7667}}; ruins; Shebarim, a place in Palestine; Shebarim.

h7672.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7660}}; to entangle, i.e. perplex; be astonished.

h7673.definition: a primitive root; to repose, i.e. desist from exertion; used in many implied relations (causative, figurative or specific); (cause to, let, make to) cease, celebrate, cause (make) to fail, keep (sabbath), suffer to be lacking, leave, put away (down), (make to) rest, rid, still, take away.

h7674.definition: from {{h7673}}; rest, interruption, cessation; cease, sit still, loss of time.

h7675.definition: infinitive of {{h3427}}; properly, session; but used also concretely, an abode or locality; place, seat. Compare {{h3429}}.

h7676.definition: intensive from {{h7673}}; intermission, i.e (specifically) the Sabbath; (  every) sabbath.

h7677.definition: from {{h7676}}; a sabbatism or special holiday; rest, sabbath.

h7678.definition: from {{h7676}}; restful; Shabbethai, the name of three Israelites; Shabbethai.

h7679.definition: ; a primitive root; to grow, i.e. (causatively) to enlarge, (figuratively) laud; increase, magnify.

h7680.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7679}}; to increase; grow, be multiplied.

h7681.definition: probably from {{h7686}}; erring; Shage, an Israelite; Shage.

h7682.definition: a primitive root; to be (causatively, make) lofty, especially inaccessible; by implication, safe, strong; used literally and figuratively; defend, exalt, be excellent, (be, set on) high, lofty, be safe, set up (on high), be too strong.

h7683.definition: a primitive root; to stray, i.e. (figuratively) sin (with more or less apology); × also for that, deceived, err, go astray, sin ignorantly.

h7684.definition: from {{h7683}}; a mistake or inadvertent transgression; error, ignorance, at unawares; unwittingly.

h7685.definition: a primitive root; to enlarge (especially upward, also figuratively); grow (up), increase.

h7686.definition: a primitive root; to stray (causatively, mislead), usually (figuratively) to mistake, especially (morally) to transgress; by extension (through the idea of intoxication) to reel, (figuratively) be enraptured; (cause to) go astray, deceive, err, be ravished, sin through ignorance, (let, make to) wander.

h7687.definition: from {{h7682}}; aloft; Segub, the name of two Israelites; Segub.

h7688.definition: a primitive root; to peep, i.e. glance sharply at; look (narrowly).

h7690.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7689}}; large (in size, quantity or number, also adverbial); exceeding, great(-ly); many, much, sore, very.

h7692.definition: or שִׁגָּיֹנָה; from {{h7686}}; properly, aberration, i.e. (technically) a dithyramb or rambling poem; Shiggaion, Shigionoth.

h7693.definition: a primitive root; to copulate with; lie with, ravish.

h7696.definition: a primitive root; to rave through insanity; (be, play the) mad (man).

h7698.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to eject; the fœtus (as finally expelled); that cometh of, increase.

h7699.definition: or שֹׁד; probably from {{h7736}} (in its original sense) contracted; the breast of a woman or animal (as bulging); breast, pap, teat.
